type: Legendary Creature – Human Bird Noble Lord
rules_text:
Lifelink
[i]Savior of the Dawn[/i] – Whenever Micaiah, Queen of Daein enters or attacks, return target legendary creature from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
[i]Sacrifice[/i] – Pay X Life: Support X. Activate this only once each turn and only as a sorcery.
Partner with Ike, Supreme Commander
